title: CloudReady Installation (Makeshift Chromebook) - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
tags: CloudReady Installation (Makeshift Chromebook) - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
description: With CloudReady, you can turn any laptop computer into a Chrome device. It's like a makeshift Chromebook. Due to heavy demand, Krazy Ken takes on a CloudReady installation sensation.  Support the show and get in the credits   Want more videos like this?   Subscribe for more tech videos!    Like the CC on Facebook   Follow the CC on Twitter   Follow Ken on Twitter: @Hildron101010  Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures #73 - CloudReady Installation (Makeshift Chromebook)  Krazy Ken is now on Patreon! Pledge now to help support the show and get an opportunity to be in the show's credits!   Contact the CC    Want music for your videos?   (We use these guys a lot. They're good.)  Get film gear Ken uses   On a lower budget?   Amazon links are powered by the Amazon Associates Program.  #KrazyKen
